short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize selected text directly from the browser, highlighting key points for better comprehension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summifier is a powerful text summarization browser extension tool designed to condense large blocks of text into concise summaries. Whether you're dealing with articles, reports, or any lengthy content, Summifier leverages natural language processing (NLP) techniques to generate clear and accurate summaries, saving you time and effort.
